com.github.wuic.resource
Interface WuicResourceProtocol

All Known Implementing Classes:
DiskWuicResourceProtocol, FtpWuicResourceProtocol, GStorageWuicResourceProtocol, HttpWuicResourceProtocol, S3WuicResourceProtocol, SshWuicResourceProtocol
public interface WuicResourceProtocol

This interface abstracts the way you can read resources through a particular protocol.

Since:
0.3.1
Version:
1.1
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

Method Summary
 WuicResource accessFor(String realPath, FileType type)
           Creates an access for the given parameters through a WuicResource implementation.
 List<String> listResourcesPaths(Pattern pattern)
           Lists all the resources path matching the given pattern.
 

Method Detail

listResourcesPaths

List<String> listResourcesPaths(Pattern pattern)
                                throws StreamException

Lists all the resources path matching the given pattern.

Parameters:
pattern - the pattern
Throws:
StreamException - if any I/O error occurs while reading resources

accessFor

WuicResource accessFor(String realPath,
                       FileType type)
                       throws StreamException

Creates an access for the given parameters through a WuicResource implementation.

Parameters:
realPath - the real path to use to access the resource
type - the path's type
Returns:
the WuicResource
Throws:
StreamException - if an I/O error occurs while creating access
